And <S%H6680>command<s%> them to <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H113>masters,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> your <S%H113>masters;<s%>

I <S%H595><s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> and the <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by my <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> it unto <S%H834>whom<s%> it <S%H5869>seemed<s%> <S%H3474>meet<s%> unto me.

And <S%H6258>now<s%> have <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H776>lands<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the very <S%H6256>time<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>come:<s%> and <S%H1571>then<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of <S%H1931>him.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H853>same<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H834>that<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> will I <S%H6485>punish,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I have <S%H8552>consumed<s%> them by his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> nor <S%H413>to<s%> your <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> nor <S%H413>to<s%> your <S%H2472>dreamers,<s%> nor <S%H413>to<s%> your <S%H6049>enchanters,<s%> nor <S%H413>to<s%> your <S%H3786>sorcerers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992><s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of Babylon: <S%H894><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> unto you, <S%H4616>to<s%> remove you <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H127>land;<s%> and that I should drive you <S%H5080>out,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and ye should <S%H6>perish.<s%>

But the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, those will I let <S%H5117>remain<s%> still <S%H5921>in<s%> their own <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall <S%H5647>till<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> also <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>Bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H6677>necks<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> will ye <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> yet <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> in my <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I might drive you <S%H5080>out,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and that ye might <S%H6>perish,<s%> <S%H859>ye,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto you.

Also I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H4120>shortly<s%> be brought <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H4480>Babylon:<s%> <S%H894><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> unto you.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> should <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> laid <S%H2723>waste?<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> be <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, let them <S%H4994>now<s%> make <S%H6293>intercession<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>
